properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:40AM CST until January 13 at 3:51AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Missouri...

St. Francis River near Patterson

.River levels along the St. Francis River are rising due to heavy
rainfall of 1 to 2 inches that has fallen over the past 24 hours
combined with additional heavy rain forecast over the next 36 hours.
Minor flooding is forecast to develop at Patterson on Saturday morning,
with a crest near 22 feet forecast Saturday night.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the St. Francis River near Patterson.
* from Saturday morning to late Sunday night.
* At  9:00 AM Friday the stage was 8.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow late morning and
continue to rise to near 22.0 feet by Saturday night. The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday before midnight.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
